modName: Skyrim Switcher - Alt-Tab Replacement - 360 pad support
summary:
Switch between Skyrim and Desktop fast without using Task Manager trick on fullscreen Alt-Tab.
No more double Alt-Tabbing. Use your gamepad?
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15022]Skyrim Commander[/url] now includes all these functions plus more[/size]



[size=3][color=gold][b]Switch between Skyrim and Desktop fast without using Task Manager trick on fullscreen Alt-Tab.[/color]
[color=orange]No more double Alt-Tabbing.[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=green]Supports Xbox 360 controller[/color][/size]
Safe choice of gamepad buttons (Left Bumper + Start or Back) to allow this awesome function.

[color=aqua][b]Hotkeys:[/b][/color]
 [color=gold]Ctrl+Alt+Up Arrow[/color];    Switch to Skyrim. Alternate to Alt-Tab. No more double Alt-Tabbing back to Skyrim.
 [color=gold]Ctrl+Alt+Down Arrow[/color];  Switch to Desktop. Skyrim will pause, same as it does when Alt-Tabbing.
[color=aqua][b]Hot Buttons:[/b][/color]
 [color=gold]LeftBumper(LB)+Start[/color]: Switch to Skyrim. Alternate to Alt-Tab.
 [color=gold]LeftBumper(LB)+Back[/color]:  Switch to Desktop. Skyrim will pause, same as it does when Alt-Tabbing.

[color=orange]And Skyrim can be running before starting Skyrim Switcher and vice versa.[/color]

[color=aqua][b]How to Install, use and test the exe (fast & easy):[/b][/color]
 1. Extract the \"+Skyrim_Switcher_v1_0.exe\" file from the downloaded zip wherever you like.
 2. Run \"+Skyrim_Switcher_v1_0.exe\". IF Skyrim is Run as Administrator, Run this exe as Administrator.
 3. Switch to Skyrim, Ctrl+Alt+Up Arrow or use your gamepad.
 4. Switch back to Desktop, Ctrl+Alt+Down Arrow or use your gamepad.
 ^ Note: You can decompile the \"+Skyrim_Switcher_v1_0.exe\", to check it\'s integrity;
   ( [color=green]http://www.autohotkey.com/forum/topic6973.html[/color] )

[color=lime]< Use either the exe or the ahk >[/color]

[color=aqua][b]How to Install, use and test the ahk (requires AutoHotkey installed):[/b][/color]
 1. This is an AutoHotkey script. Download and install AutoHotkey; http://www.autohotkey.com
 2. Extract the \"Skyrim_Switcher_v1_0.ahk\" file from the downloaded zip wherever you like.
 3. Run \"Skyrim_Switcher_v1_0.ahk\". IF Skyrim is Run as Administrator, Run this ahk as Administrator.
 4. Works the same as the exe.

Script created by Guru82 for Skyrim Nexusmods.com using knowledge from various forums.
This script comes from part of Direct Input Paste, one of my others.

Enjoy the simplicity :D
author: Guru82

files.name: Skyrim Switcher - X360 Controller Support v1_1
